items.sentence: Tom hasn\'t been able to get in touch with Mary yet.
Tom and I have worked together for over three years.
I have a niece. She goes to the same school as Mary.
Friends are easy to find, but they\'re hard to keep.
I\'m still trying to find out what needs to be done.
Is Tom really going to go to Australia without Mary?
Is it possible to buy something to eat on the train?
I don\'t think Tom knows Mary can understand French.
I don\'t think Tom would mind if I used his bicycle.
He took a look at the newspaper before going to bed.
Tom is finally going to do what he told us he\'d do.
Tom realized he didn\'t have enough time to do that.
Tom realized he wasn\'t going to be able to do that.
Tom refused to let Mary go out and play in the rain.
Tom reminded Mary not to forget to flush the toilet.
Tom fell asleep almost as soon as the movie started.
I hope we don\'t run into any bureaucratic red tape.
We have enough money to buy one more bottle of wine.
We know that doing that will require a lot of money.
We need to stop at the Hilton Hotel and pick Tom up.
I think I have a pretty good idea what Tom might do.
I checked my watch and realized I was an hour early.
I drank beer for the first time when I was thirteen.
The person who planted the bomb hasn\'t been caught.
I think that you should change your profile picture.
I think we should tell Tom that he needs to do that.
I just happened to be there at the same time as Tom.
I\'ll see if I can find out what Tom wants us to do.
I\'m going to warn Tom that Mary is looking for him.
I need to talk to Tom about what\'s going to happen.
I never for a moment imagined that I\'d be homeless.
Why didn\'t you tell me you were going to Australia?
Do you think that Tom would mind helping me do that?
Tom is upset with Mary because she didn\'t help him.
Tom is waiting for you to finish what you\'re doing.
What\'s the real reason you didn\'t want to do that?
I thought Tom had another hour to finish the report.
I thought Tom said that he liked this kind of music.
Tom doesn\'t need to come into the office on Monday.
There used to be a school across the street from us.
These headaches of mine are getting worse and worse.
Are you quite certain it was Tom you saw doing that?
Tom stopped at a convenience store to buy some milk.
Tom surprised Mary by bringing her breakfast in bed.
Tom switched off all the lights and lit the candles.
Tom and Mary borrowed money from family and friends.
Tom and Mary have been friends since they were kids.
I want someone to tell me why Tom isn\'t here today.
Tom is the only Canadian that I invited to my party.
Tom is the only one here who knows where Mary lives.
